Text: Taku Jihofa ka ñw mi kakini, Dagba Mose̩s kpai Samue̩l dago o̩gba-mi-i, e̩do̩-mi ma rida tʼugbo amone̩-i n. Je̩ ñw ma kwo bʼumi eju te̩, e̩ la tʼuma no̩ ku ma lo!
Oñ e̩gba ku ma tʼuwe̩ ene kakini, Ugbo a anyi? E̩gbale̩ uwe̩ aka ñw ma kakini, Abu ki Jihofa ka de̩ kakini:
Omi akʼame̩wñ me̩le̩ wa nʼo̩da ma, Jihofa ka-i; o̩kwo̩chageli ki kpa ma amabia ku ma fʼuma fana, oñ ame̩we̩ ojale kpʼame̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ ile̩ kʼama ki ko ma je̩ ku ma la ko ma kpabie̩.
Omi la aje̩ ñw ma chʼe̩wñ ku ma ño̩ alo tʼemi tʼemi ojane̩ ojane̩ ile̩-i du, tod e̩wñ ku Manasa, o̩ma He̩ze̩kaya, onu Juda, che Je̩rusale̩m.
E̩ne̩ alʼuwe̩ ejumomi, O Je̩rusale̩m?
Uwe̩ hi umi tinyo̩ me̩, Jihofa aka-i,
Omi nʼo̩da fʼuma fe̩
Omi je̩ ñw amo̩ya ukuo̩ko̩-ma ku ma wewe
O̩la e̩ne̩ ki fʼo̩ma mebie bi muda,
Atogwo chʼe-mi, iye-mi, abu kʼuwe̩ fʼumi bi kʼu chʼe̩ne̩ uja kpʼe̩ne̩ aida ñw o̩gbo̩ ane̩-i du! U me̩ e̩wñ ñw one̩ n, one̩ la me̩ e̩wñ ñw mi n, o̩chaka ma muda abʼumi na.
Jihofa kakini, Ochochi, omi adʼo̩bata ñw e̩ kʼi chʼe̩nyo̩ ñw e̩; ochochi naje̩ ñw e̩nebi le̩ ki gbo̩ko̩bʼuwe̩ iko e̩bie̩ne̩ kpai iko o̩bata.
Ebije jʼaguche̩? ebije ki kwʼo̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩ le̩? kpai ebije-ikpa?
Nakʼidu-we̩ kpʼe̩wñ akoko-we̩ chʼe̩wñ kʼogu je̩, i nʼo̩me̩ era n, todu adure-we̩ chaka ugbo du ef alo̩me̩-we̩.
U la aje̩ ñw ma lale bʼame̩nebi-we̩ tʼoj ane̩ kʼe̩ ma ma n, todu una chʼeko te̩ ef uwe̩do̩-mi ki a jo bʼume̩ ma.
O Jihofa, uwe̩ chema;
Ma fʼo̩la-we̩ li, oñ omi mʼu ko je̩,
U gugu ef ujeju abo ku ma chiya n, u la gwoye n;
E̩wñ chi kʼiwo̩-mi ma nʼuda n?
Todule̩ abu ki Jihofa ka de̩ kakini:
Tak u naje̩ ñw e̩ chʼaku ebijekpa ñw amone̩-i;
